topic.title: How to Add a Draft Watermark on All Pages

body.p: To add a draft watermark to all of your publication pages you can use the following page selector in your customization CSS.
If you already set a background image for other pages, like the front-page or the table-of-contents, the above selector won't change them, as they are more specific.

The best practice is to use a different "draft.css" CSS file that imports the customization css where the rest of the style changes reside. If you need to publish as draft, use the "draft.css" in your transformation scenario, otherwise refer directly the customization CSS.
